name: Arafinn - Return to Nangrim
summary:
Return to Nangrim is a first-person fantasy game with RPG and survival elements. The game mechanics involve exploration, research, puzzle solving and defense strategies in order to unveil the secrets and story of Nangrim. 
 
Procedurally generated content and puzzles guarantee a different gaming experience for each and every player. Although the focus is not on fighting, the player should be prepared to defend himself against the dangers that are lurking in the shadows. To successfully survive in the countless halls of Nangrim the protagonist must fall back on the ancient knowledge of the Stonebeards. Concealed in numberless books the Stonebeards‘ wisdom is waiting for the player to be discovered.
storyline: The Lands of Arafinn are afflicted by a smoldering conflict that outlasts hundreds of generations. After the North fell, Nangrim, home of the Stonebeards, soon got overrun by the invaders. Now - centuries later - it is the player’s quest to discover this forsaken place and reveal the secrets buried in the cold depths of Nangrim.
